title: Countryside Getaway with Indulgent Gourmet Inclusions
description: Lovers of fine wine and gastronomy will fall head over heels for Cape Lodge, a gorgeous countryside getaway in the midst of Margaret River wine country. Includes daily a la carte and continental buffet breakfasts, an indulgent dining platter crafted from the finest local ingredients including prawns and truffle butter, an AU$100 credit to spend on dining or a Best of Margaret tour, a bottle of local wine and more.

title: Timeless Hyatt Elegance in Vibrant Perth
description: Experience timeless luxury and high-end service as you discover the laid-back city lifestyle of Perth with stunning beaches, rooftop bars, top-notch restaurants and Australiaâ€™s premium wine region at your fingertips. Enjoy a stylish getaway at the Hyatt Regency Perth and treat yourself with daily buffet breakfast, a bottle of Western Australian wine, an AU$20 in-room movie credit and a guaranteed, leisurely late 1pm check-out, so you can make the most of your stay. Club Lounge upgrade available.

title: Mantarays Ningaloo Beach Resort: Ocean Paradise in Western Australia
description: Get away to Exmouth and experience a breathtakingly pristine part of Australia where you can swim with whale sharks, hump back whales and giant manta rays, spot sea turtles and snorkel along the World Heritage-Listed Ningaloo Reef. Enjoy three nights in a Standard King Room at Mantarays Ningaloo Beach Resort with daily breakfasts, a daily drink voucher and late checkout.
